settings.title: Order Online
settings.answer:
The process is all online, utilizing our online order form.

Select the Service Level required !

Enter in the details of each card being submitted !

Hit Submit Order

Payment as per normal process

All details of each card is printed on your order confirmation

Please note Collectible Madness is providing a Middleman Service and CGC are providing the Card Grading Services in the USA !

Link here

settings.title: Required Card Details
settings.answer:
For each card submitted we require the follow details of the specific card:

1. The Year of the card !

2. What expansion set it refers to !

3. Card Name and Rarity

4. Card Number and Expansion set number

5. Expected Graded Value (USD)

Example:

Year: 2020

Expansion Set: Sword and Shield

Card name and Rarity: Celebi V Ultra Rare

Card Number and Set number: 1 / 202

Card Graded Value: USD$20

settings.title: Economy Service
settings.answer:
This service is for cards with a Declared value of maximum USD$500 (per card).

Grading Submission Cost" $50 per card

CGC ESTIMATED TURNAROUND**: 40 Business Days

**This does not included transit time from Collectible Madness to CGC and CGC back to Collectible Madness

**Turnaround times are approximate and not guaranteed.

settings.title: Standard Service
settings.answer:
This service is for cards with a Declared value of maximum USD$1000 (per card).

Grading Submission Cost" $70 per card

CGC ESTIMATED TURNAROUND**: 30 Business Days

**This does not included transit time from Collectible Madness to CGC and CGC back to Collectible Madness

settings.title: Express Service
settings.answer:
This service is for cards with a Declared value of maximum USD$10,000 (per card).

Grading Submission Cost" $120 per card

CGC ESTIMATED TURNAROUND**: 10 Business Days

**This does not included transit time from Collectible Madness to CGC and CGC back to Collectible Madness

**Turnaround times are approximate and not guaranteed.

settings.title: Sub-Grades
settings.answer:
Sub-Grades are available on all Service levels.

This is selectable within the submission form.

In addition to its overall grade, a card is assigned grades for Centering, Corners, Edges and Surface.

settings.title: Fair Market Value
settings.answer:
In the event that CGC, at its sole discretion, determines that the fair market value of a collectible is higher than the value stated by the submitter, CGC will move the collectible to the appropriate higher tier and the additional charge will be the responsibility of the submitter.

For more information on determining fair market value, review the Declared Value Policy.

settings.title: Declared Value
settings.answer:
The declared value is based on the raw card being submitted.

To understand | determine the current value in USD, we suggest to use Troll and Toad to assist with pricing of your card. See link below:

Troll and Toad

You can also use eBay to help:

eBay

settings.title: Sending your cards to Collectible Madness
Step 1. Sleeve and Top Load them please !
settings.answer: It is a requirement to place your card into a new penny sleeve then insert the card into either a top loader or a semi-rigid card saver.

settings.title: Step 2. Don't let them move !
settings.answer:
It is important that the cards do not move too much.

So please put all of your cards in between two cardboard pieces that are larger than the items. Hold the package together with rubber bands. Ensure that the rubber bands are not too tight. They should be just tight enough to hold the cardboard pieces together and prevent the cards from falling out.

settings.title: Step 3. Package them  !
settings.answer:
Once Steps 1 and 2 are completed, you are now at the packaging step. We recommend to package in a small box or a padded bubble mailer.

Make sure you also include your order confirmation.

settings.title: Step 4. Lastly, Send them !
settings.answer:
Post too:

Collectible Madness

PO Box 6141

Burton SA 5110

Please note that Collectible Madness does not take any responsibility on the packaging and transport to us.

It is also highly recommended that you send your cards with tracking and signature.

Send any tracking details to:

collectible.madness@gmail.com

so that we can monitor and track the progress.

settings.title: Submissions
settings.answer:
Collectible Madness will submit all cards (no matter the service level) for grading to CGC on the first business day of every month

All submissions will be tracked and updated on our website

settings.title: Transit and Process Time "TO" and "FROM" CGC
settings.answer:
Transit Times

5 to 7 days (approx) Transit from Collectible Madness to CGC
5 to 10 days (approx) time to register onto CGC system

Grading time (based on service level) at CGC then
5 to 7 days (approx) Transit back to Collectible Madness

**Turnaround times are approximate and not guaranteed.

settings.title: Transit from Collectible Madness Back to Customer
settings.answer:
For any order that is under the the value of $100, free standard delivery applies.

For Express service price is available during check out !

settings.title: Insurance and Customs Duty !
settings.answer:
Unfortunately "NO" insurance will be taken ! Due to the nature of this product and the potential high values to be declared, more attention is given to the parcel through the logistics journey.

Therefore encountering large fees, excessive delays within customs, additional customs and duty charges.

Due to this, Collectible Madness does not take any responsibility to cover your lost order and no refund will be offered.

However, if you are submitting a card(s) and would wish for insurance, we would be happy to quote the total cost and help provide you that piece of mind

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
